results.title: Vlogs: Korpo Island (Near Turku)
results.description: In this short video, I show some clips from our trip to the Korpo island. There was some kayaking and other kinds of fun activities. And my cousin's wedding, which I don't cover much.
results.collectionTitle: Finnish Language Through Vlogs (Mostly in Slow Finnish)

results.title: Finnish Language Through Vlogs: Helsinki + Keilaniemi (Espoo)
results.description:
In this video, we will learn Finnish while walking around Helsinki in interesting places. Also we will shortly visit Keilaniemi (Espoo).

Other videos learners of Finnish may find useful: 
Finnish Language (Daily Life Phrases With Comics)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VcLx1WwD6ec

Common Questions in Finnish + Answers ➜ Easier Conversations https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uHQ69cjT0gc

Useful Sentence Starters – Finnish Language (Includes Comics)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zTWh9NYxSDY&t=214s&ab_channel=FinnishLanguageNuggets

Finnish Language Through Vlogs: Trip To Crete (Greece)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pSGAhE61LIM

Finnish Language With Comics: How To Ask Questions (Not Only Basics)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wlOxkgp_62k&ab_channel=FinnishLanguageNuggets

Weird and Interesting Places in Helsinki (Learn Finnish With Vlogs)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A8yrRt7Gqic

Finnish Grammar With Comics | 12 Important Noun Cases  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EXMYyhqz-dU 
Finnish Grammar With Comics | Verb Basics 1 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZvWoDiNjSL4

Boost Your Finnish Pretty Effortlessly With 130+ Post-it Notes Around Your House (Whole Sentences) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yYWQ-zuVMg4
#learnfinnish #finnishlanguage

results.title: Finnish Language Through Vlogs: Trip To Crete (Greece)
results.description:
This video contains some natural Helsinki area spoken language. It is understood well in other parts of Finland, and this form of the language affects other dialects too.

results.title: Finnish Language Through Vlogs: Trip To Eastern Sicily (Italy)
results.description:
We travelled to Sicily in November of 2021. This video contains footage from that trip. This video contains some natural Helsinki area spoken language. It is understood well in other parts of Finland, and this form of the language affects other dialects too.

Other videos you may find useful: 
Common Questions in Finnish + Answers ➜ Easier Conversations https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uHQ69cjT0gc

results.title: Finnish Language With Travel Videos: Addis Abeba, Ethiopia
results.description:
This video is about our trip to Ethiopia to meet my wife's family. It's a beautiful city. I hope you enjoy it. I'm a native speaker of Finnish language living in Helsinki.
#travelvideos #finnishlanguage
results.collectionTitle: Finnish Language Through Vlogs (Mostly in Slow Finnish)
